title: Performance Degradation - Slow Page Load Times
description: Medium operational issue: Significant performance degradation with First Contentful Paint exceeding 2400ms (threshold 2000ms). Home page loading 16.2s, Invoices page 8.8s, with 20+ console errors during standard operation. Root cause: Unoptimized bundle sizes, console error accumulation, and performance regression. Prevention: Implement performance monitoring baselines, automated performance testing, and regular performance audits.
